title: Sweden has few coronavirus restrictions. Here's why
description: Sweden has some of the fewest limits on social movement in any European country.  Its containment of the novel coronavirus is largely based on voluntary action. CNN's Bianca Nobilo reports.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.
